properties.description: Copy data from a REST API

activities.name: Copy data from SB3 to DEMO_JSON

source.sqlReaderQuery:
select p.ID_SEC_PERSON,p.TX_LOGIN,p.TX_NAME,c.ID_CUSTOMER,c.TX_CUSTOMER_NAME
from [SB3].[SB3].[SEC_PERSON] p
inner join [SB3].[SB3].[SEC_PERSON_CUSTOMER] pc on p.ID_SEC_PERSON = pc.ID_SEC_PERSON_REPORTER
inner join [SB3].[SB3].[CUSTOMER] c on c.ID_CUSTOMER = pc.ID_CUSTOMER
where p.TX_EMAIL1 LIKE 'fernando%'
and pc.ID_SEC_CONTEXT = 5;

properties.description: Copia dados do SB3 SQL Azure para o Excel - formato CSV

activities.name: Copia dados do SQL SB3 Azure para uma planilha Excel

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT top(500) 
    a.ID_CALL_HD,
    a.ID_CALL_ATTACH,
    ch.ID_SEC_CONTEXT,
    ch.DT_CALL_OPENING,
    ch.ID_CUSTOMER,
    REPLACE(ch.TX_CALL_DESCRIPTION,CHAR(10),' , ') as TX_CALL_DESCRIPTION,
    a.TX_FILE_NAME,
    a.TX_FILE_PATH,
    ch.YEAR,
    ch.DT_MES
FROM @{concat('[bdlegadosb3].[',variables('vTableAnexos'),']')} as a 
LEFT JOIN @{concat('[bdlegadosb3].[',variables('vTableChamados'),']')} AS ch 
	ON ch.ID_CALL_HD = a.ID_CALL_HD 
WHERE ch.DT_MES = @{variables('vMes')} AND ch.YEAR = @{variables('vAno')} 
ORDER BY ch.DT_CALL_OPENING ASC

activities.name: Contexto
activities.description: Define o contexto que será utilizado na query.

properties.description: Pipeline para criação de arquivos CSV
Copia base local para base no Azure

activities.name: Copia dados do SQL Local para SQL Azure

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT FORMAT(ch.DT_CALL_OPENING, 'yyyy') AS YEAR,
	CAST(ch.ID_CALL_HD AS CHAR(13)) AS ID_CALL_HD,
	CONVERT(int,CAST(ch.DT_CALL_OPENING as datetime)) AS DT_CALL_OPENING_VALUE,
	CAST(MONTH(ch.DT_CALL_OPENING) AS CHAR(2)) AS DT_MES,
	sc.TX_SEC_CONTEXT AS ID_SEC_CONTEXT,
	spr.TX_LOGIN + ':' + spr.TX_NAME AS ID_SEC_PERSON_REPORTER,
	spa.TX_LOGIN + ':' + spr.TX_NAME AS ID_SEC_PERSON_ATTENDANT,
	ct.TX_CALL_TYPE AS ID_CALL_TYPE,
	i.TX_IMPACT AS ID_IMPACT,
	p.TX_PRIORITY AS ID_PRIORITY,
	ch.TX_CALL_DESCRIPTION,
	ch.DT_CALL_OPENING,
	ch.DT_CALL_REGISTER,
	ch.NR_TIME_DURATION,
	CONVERT(VARCHAR(MAX),c.ID_PLACE) + ':' + c.TX_CUSTOMER_NAME AS ID_CUSTOMER,
	cs.TX_CALL_STATUS AS ID_CALL_STATUS,
	cr.TX_CALL_RETURN AS ID_CALL_RETURN,
	ch.DT_CALL_RETURN,
	co.TX_CALL_ORIGIN AS ID_CALL_ORIGIN,
	ch.DT_CALL_ORIGIN,
	ch.DT_CALL_LIMIT,
	ch.NR_TIME_SERVICE,
	ch.NR_EFFORT,
	ch.NR_DELAY,
	ch.BO_TIME_CALCULATED,
	ch.TX_CLOSING_SOURCE,
	ch.DT_LAST_CALCULATION,
	ch.TX_SOURCE_LAST_CALCULATION,
	cc1.TX_CALL_COMPLEMENT_01 AS ID_CALL_COMPLEMENT_01,
	cc2.TX_CALL_COMPLEMENT_02 AS ID_CALL_COMPLEMENT_02,
	cc3.TX_CALL_COMPLEMENT_03 AS ID_CALL_COMPLEMENT_03,
	cp.TX_CALL_PHASE AS ID_CALL_PHASE,
	ch.DT_CREATION,
	spc.TX_LOGIN + ':' + spc.TX_NAME AS ID_SEC_PERSON_CREATOR,
	ch.DT_MODIFY,
	ch.ID_SEC_PERSON_MODIFIER,
	ch.ID_CHAT,
	ch.CD_DETACHMENT_PROCESS,
	ch.DT_DETACHMENT_PROCESS
FROM [SB3].[SB3].[CALL_HD] AS ch
LEFT JOIN [SB3].[SB3].[SEC_CONTEXT] AS sc
	ON sc.ID_SEC_CONTEXT = ch.ID_SEC_CONTEXT
LEFT JOIN [SB3].[SB3].[SEC_PERSON] AS spr
	ON spr.ID_SEC_PERSON = ch.ID_SEC_PERSON_REPORTER
LEFT JOIN [SB3].[SB3].[SEC_PERSON] AS spa
	ON spa.ID_SEC_PERSON = ch.ID_SEC_PERSON_ATTENDANT
LEFT JOIN [SB3].[SB3].[CALL_TYPE] AS ct
	ON ct.ID_CALL_TYPE = ch.ID_CALL_TYPE
LEFT JOIN [SB3].[SB3].[IMPACT] AS i
	ON i.ID_IMPACT = ch.ID_IMPACT
LEFT JOIN [SB3].[SB3].[PRIORITY] AS p
	ON p.ID_PRIORITY = ch.ID_PRIORITY
LEFT JOIN [SB3].[SB3].[CUSTOMER] AS c
	ON c.ID_CUSTOMER = ch.ID_CUSTOMER
LEFT JOIN [SB3].[SB3].[CALL_STATUS] AS cs
	ON cs.ID_CALL_STATUS = ch.ID_CALL_STATUS
LEFT JOIN [SB3].[SB3].[CALL_RETURN] AS cr
	ON cr.ID_CALL_RETURN = ch.ID_CALL_RETURN
LEFT JOIN [SB3].[SB3].[CALL_ORIGIN] AS co
	ON co.ID_CALL_ORIGIN = ch.ID_CALL_ORIGIN
LEFT JOIN [SB3].[SB3].[CALL_COMPLEMENT_01] AS cc1
	ON cc1.ID_CALL_COMPLEMENT_01 = ch.ID_CALL_COMPLEMENT_01
LEFT JOIN [SB3].[SB3].[CALL_COMPLEMENT_02] AS cc2
	ON cc2.ID_CALL_COMPLEMENT_02 = ch.ID_CALL_COMPLEMENT_02
LEFT JOIN [SB3].[SB3].[CALL_COMPLEMENT_03] AS cc3
	ON cc3.ID_CALL_COMPLEMENT_03 = ch.ID_CALL_COMPLEMENT_03
LEFT JOIN [SB3].[SB3].[CALL_PHASE] AS cp
	ON cp.ID_CALL_PHASE = ch.ID_CALL_PHASE
LEFT JOIN [SB3].[SB3].[SEC_PERSON] AS spc
	ON spc.ID_SEC_PERSON = ch.ID_SEC_PERSON_CREATOR
WHERE
	ch.ID_SEC_CONTEXT = 2

properties.description: Copia base local para base no Azure - tabelas de anexos.

activities.name: Copia dados do SQL Local para SQL Azure - Anexos

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT 
        a.ID_CALL_ATTACH,
	a.ID_CALL_HD,
	a.TX_FILE_NAME,
	a.TX_FILE_PATH
FROM [SB3].[SB3].[CALL_ATTACH] as a

 LEFT JOIN [SB3].[SB3].[CALL_HD] AS ch
	ON ch.ID_CALL_HD = a.ID_CALL_HD

WHERE a.ID_SEC_CONTEXT = 0

properties.description: Copia base local para base no Azure para Recebimento Fiscal.

activities.name: RecFiscal SQL Local para SQL Azure

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT 
    FORMAT(ch.DT_CALL_OPENING, 'yyyy') AS "YEAR",
    ch.ID_CALL_HD,
    sc.TX_SEC_CONTEXT AS "ID_SEC_CONTEXT",
    spr.TX_LOGIN + ':' + spr.TX_NAME AS "ID_SEC_PERSON_REPORTER",
    spa.TX_LOGIN + ':' + spr.TX_NAME AS "ID_SEC_PERSON_ATTENDANT",
    ct.TX_CALL_TYPE AS "ID_CALL_TYPE",
    i.TX_IMPACT AS "ID_IMPACT",
    p.TX_PRIORITY AS "ID_PRIORITY",
    ch.TX_CALL_DESCRIPTION,
    ch.DT_CALL_OPENING,
    ch.DT_CALL_REGISTER,
    ch.NR_TIME_DURATION,
    CONVERT(VARCHAR(MAX),c.ID_PLACE) + ':' + c.TX_CUSTOMER_NAME AS "ID_CUSTOMER",
    cs.TX_CALL_STATUS AS ID_CALL_STATUS,
    cr.TX_CALL_RETURN AS "ID_CALL_RETURN",
    ch.DT_CALL_RETURN,
    co.TX_CALL_ORIGIN AS "ID_CALL_ORIGIN",
    ch.DT_CALL_ORIGIN,
    ch.DT_CALL_LIMIT,
    ch.NR_TIME_SERVICE,
    ch.NR_EFFORT,
    ch.NR_DELAY,
    ch.BO_TIME_CALCULATED,
    ch.TX_CLOSING_SOURCE,
    ch.DT_LAST_CALCULATION,
    ch.TX_SOURCE_LAST_CALCULATION,
    cc1.TX_CALL_COMPLEMENT_01 AS "ID_CALL_COMPLEMENT_01",
    cc2.TX_CALL_COMPLEMENT_02 AS "ID_CALL_COMPLEMENT_02",
    cc3.TX_CALL_COMPLEMENT_03 AS "ID_CALL_COMPLEMENT_03",
    cp.TX_CALL_PHASE AS "ID_CALL_PHASE",
    ch.DT_CREATION,
    spc.TX_LOGIN + ':' + spc.TX_NAME AS "ID_SEC_PERSON_CREATOR",
    ch.DT_MODIFY,
    ch.ID_SEC_PERSON_MODIFIER,
    ch.ID_CHAT,
    ch.CD_DETACHMENT_PROCESS,
    ch.DT_DETACHMENT_PROCESS

 

FROM [SB3].[SB3].[CALL_HD] AS ch

 

LEFT JOIN [SB3].[SB3].[SEC_CONTEXT] AS sc
    ON sc.ID_SEC_CONTEXT = ch.ID_SEC_CONTEXT
LEFT JOIN [SB3].[SB3].[SEC_PERSON] AS spr
    ON spr.ID_SEC_PERSON = ch.ID_SEC_PERSON_REPORTER
LEFT JOIN [SB3].[SB3].[SEC_PERSON] AS spa
    ON spa.ID_SEC_PERSON = ch.ID_SEC_PERSON_ATTENDANT
LEFT JOIN [SB3].[SB3].[CALL_TYPE] AS ct
    ON ct.ID_CALL_TYPE = ch.ID_CALL_TYPE
LEFT JOIN [SB3].[SB3].[IMPACT] AS i
    ON i.ID_IMPACT = ch.ID_IMPACT
LEFT JOIN [SB3].[SB3].[PRIORITY] AS p
    ON p.ID_PRIORITY = ch.ID_PRIORITY
LEFT JOIN [SB3].[SB3].[CUSTOMER] AS c
    ON c.ID_CUSTOMER = ch.ID_CUSTOMER
LEFT JOIN [SB3].[SB3].[CALL_STATUS] AS cs
    ON cs.ID_CALL_STATUS = ch.ID_CALL_STATUS
LEFT JOIN [SB3].[SB3].[CALL_RETURN] AS cr
    ON cr.ID_CALL_RETURN = ch.ID_CALL_RETURN
LEFT JOIN [SB3].[SB3].[CALL_ORIGIN] AS co
    ON co.ID_CALL_ORIGIN = ch.ID_CALL_ORIGIN
LEFT JOIN [SB3].[SB3].[CALL_COMPLEMENT_01] AS cc1
    ON cc1.ID_CALL_COMPLEMENT_01 = ch.ID_CALL_COMPLEMENT_01
LEFT JOIN [SB3].[SB3].[CALL_COMPLEMENT_02] AS cc2
    ON cc2.ID_CALL_COMPLEMENT_02 = ch.ID_CALL_COMPLEMENT_02
LEFT JOIN [SB3].[SB3].[CALL_COMPLEMENT_03] AS cc3
    ON cc3.ID_CALL_COMPLEMENT_03 = ch.ID_CALL_COMPLEMENT_03
LEFT JOIN [SB3].[SB3].[CALL_PHASE] AS cp
    ON cp.ID_CALL_PHASE = ch.ID_CALL_PHASE
LEFT JOIN [SB3].[SB3].[SEC_PERSON] AS spc
    ON spc.ID_SEC_PERSON = ch.ID_SEC_PERSON_CREATOR

 

WHERE
    ch.ID_SEC_CONTEXT = 2 AND FORMAT(ch.DT_CALL_OPENING, 'yyyy') = '2019' and ch.ID_CALL_TYPE in (667,
668  ,
669  ,
670  ,
1299 ,
2462 ,
2463 ,
2551 ,
2935 ,
2945 ,
3157 ,
4096 ,
4300 ,
4355 ,
4360 ,
4367 ,
4373 ,
4375 ,
5217 ,
6016 ,
6058 ,
6803 ,
7302 ,
7526 ,
7564)
